en.qna_subtitle: Here are the most common questions with our answers.

qna.a: If you look at bitcoin’s history it has lots of ups and downs. However, look more closely and you’ll notice that after every time it goes down it increases to a new high. This is because Bitcoin is constantly growing.
At Bitcoin Profit, we are all investors in Bitcoin. Therefore, we know that the more people that join us, the bigger Bitcoin will grow.
The secret is that there is no secret. Join today and we’ll show you just how easy it is to get started trading Bitcoin.
The risk levels depend on how you trade. Join us today and we’ll show you how to maximise your profits and minimise your risk.

Bitcoin Profit enables you to easily trade your Bitcoin for real cash. We also have a state of the art platform which makes trading easier than ever before. Don’t believe us? Join today and see for yourself. Getting involved in the Bitcoin revolution has never been easier.

No catch! You simply sign up, deposit an initial trading amount of $250 and we’ll do the rest. Our platform enables the easiest way to get started trading Bitcoin. No hassle, no fuss so that you can start earning instantly.

en.mem_subtitle: There are a lot of big names in trading. Here is what some of the most famous traders have to say.

mems.name: Alexander Elder
mems.text: You can be free. You can live and work anywhere in the world. You can be independent from routine and not answer to anybody.

mems.name: Ed Seykota
mems.text: Win or lose, everybody gets what they want out of the market. Some people seem to like to lose, so they win by losing money.

mems.name: William O’Neil
mems.text: What seems too high and risky to the majority generally goes higher and what seems low and cheap generally goes lower.

mems.name: Warren Buffett
mems.text: You don't need to be a rocket scientist. Investing is not a game where the guy with the 160 IQ beats the guy with 130 IQ.
